a.title: Permalink to April Staff Spotlight: Carol Peterson

div.p: For 40 years this individual has held the keys to Bemidji Schools, that person is this month’s Employee District Spotlight, the Secretary of the Superintendent, Carol Peterson! Current Superintendent Tim […]
Pow Wow Regalia dress designed by 3rd graders at J.W. Smith School.

Bemidji Area Schools is currently accepting registrations for the Kindergarten class of 2033. After completing the registration packet (linked here) please return to the registrar by either:1. Scanning and emailing […]

li.p: Applications for Open Enrollment (outside Bemidji Area School boundaries) were due in the Registration Office (502 Minnesota Ave NW) by January 15, 2020 for the 2020-2021 school year. Our registration […]
There will be a Public Meeting to receive input on the World’s Best Workforce Report:
Monday, November 25, 2019 – 6:00 p.m. – District Office at 502 Minnesota Ave. NW in Bemidji.
